item.title: How To Setup A Linux Supercomputer for RAD-seq
item.description: Here, I’m sharing a Gist that I recently wrote, and just updated today, about setting up an account on a Linux supercomputer for analyzing RAD-seq data (e.g. from ddRAD-seq, 2bRAD methods). Here’s the Gist… https://gist.github.com/justincbagley/84f5dae6f35926c0c30bfc1cbd82eb24 Cheers ~J

item.title: Analyzing ddRADseq Data in SNAPP
